jobDescription: Job Post Index  1F65CA-Sy## Location  Des Plaines, IL Description:Responsibilities:A qualified and motivated scientist to join a team developing oncology and infectious disease molecular diagnostics assays.Conceive, design, conduct and lead independent or multi-disciplinary research driven by strategic business needs.Act as the technical lead or Project Manager and interface with other departments as well as with external collaborators to coordinate product development and improvement.Implementing and maintaining the effectiveness of the quality system.Ensures quality through sound experimental design, execution and evaluation.Conceives, plans, and executes projects related to the strategic needs of the division.Generates new product ideas consistent with division strategy.Interacts with functional groups outside R&D; to establish scope for new projects.Applies advance scientific knowledge to projects.Critically analyzes complex data, applying advanced computer skills.Presents complex technical data to large and diverse groups.Identifies/communicates to other areas in the division implications of relevant scientific observations.Maintains high level of professional expertise through familiarity with current scientific and industry literature, knowledge of competing technologies and/or products, and attendance of scientific seminars and meetings.Identifies new directions for research from literature review.Contributes to scientific presentations and publications.Participates in technology teams.Maintains and develops broad external and internal contacts as required to accomplish job objectives.
